modName: Fractured Reality - Pocket Dimension Player House and Spell Mod
summary: You get a spell that teleports you to a pocket dimension home, two brand spankin' new spells, and CUSTOM DISPLAYS????? nice
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][b]Description[/b]

[/size][size=3]This mod adds a neat little pocket dimension player home for you to teleport to whenever you gosh darn feel like. Once you're in, you'll be met with all the crafting benches you'd need to make whatever the heck you'd like. Not only will you have crafting benches, but quite a few places to display your very nice, very cool, weapons and armor pieces that you have accumulated (or added through console commands, I don't judge, in fact y'know what I encourage) over your playtime.

[/size][size=6][b]Location[/b]

[/size][size=3]The spell tome used to learn the spell "Fractured Dimension" can be found in the Midden underneath the College of Winterhold, right by that thing that you put the sigil stone in you know what I'm talking about, I have a picture don't worry.

[/size][size=6][b]Spells[/b]

[/size][size=3]So you get three spells:

[/size][size=4][b][i]Reality Fracture:[/i][/b] [/size][size=3]That's the spell you use to [s]tele to varrock[/s] teleport to the home.
﻿ ﻿ ﻿[b]Location: [/b]In the midden, near that, uh, thing you get daedric stuff from (I have pictures, cool it) you'll find the tome [b]Alternative Space[/b].
[/size]
[size=4][b][i]Fracture Storage:[/i][/b][/size][i] [/i][size=3]Cast this guy and you'll open up your hyperdimensional storage unit, where you can grab, or put in, however much your heart desires.[/size]
[size=3] ﻿ ﻿ ﻿[/size][b][size=3]Location:[/size] [/b][size=3]In the home, on the end table of your bed, you'll find the tome [/size][b][size=3]Excess Space[/size][/b][size=3].
[/size]
[size=4][b][i]Wrath:[/i][/b] [/size][size=3]This is the bad boy destruction spell you're gonna want to have. All the battlemages will be soooooo jelly of you bb. It's basically the Lightning Storm spell, except it's equipped with one hand, and its red, in addition to blue, because it also steals yo victim's life (think of it as a lightning vampiric drain :O).
﻿ ﻿ ﻿[b]Location: [/b]This spell you can craft at the spell crafting station by the big bootiful tree.

[/size][size=6][b]Updating

[/b][/size][size=3]Remove all of your [s]gud shit[/s] items from anywhere you have stored them in the home or the container spell. Next, [s]get yo a$$ outta there[/s] teleport to a vanilla location. Now you can uninstall and update![/size]

[size=6][b]Credits

[/b][/size][size=3][b]David [/b]- Absolute piece of shit, you can't even begin to imagine. Literal scum of the earth, I can't even fathom spitting in his general direction. Also, he play tested the mod, so thanks, David.
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/17279409]MrDanSG1[/url] - For making the whole custom displays thing not an actual nightmare to setup. Check out his modder's resource [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62732/]here[/url]﻿, it's  spectacular.[/size]
author: Frinovskii
